fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom
Class BasicWorklistManagementSCP

Object
  SCP
      QuerySCP
          BasicWorklistManagementSCP
public class BasicWorklistManagementSCP
extends QuerySCP

Implements a Basic Worklist Management SCP together with a user supplied BasicWorklistManagementSCPListener implementation.

A BasicWorklistManagementSCPListener instance must be specified in the constructor. The listener queryReceived method is called when the SCP receives requests.

BasicWorklistManagementSCP

public BasicWorklistManagementSCP(BasicWorklistManagementSCPListener listener,
                                  int port,
                                  InetAddress addr,
                                  SecureTransport st)
                           throws DicomException
Creates a Basic Worklist Management SCP that will listen for requests on the specified port when QuerySCP.start() is called. The transport will be insecure if st is null. The SCP will listen to all local address if addr is null.

Method Detail

start

public void start()
           throws IOException
Binds the TCP server if it has not already been bound and starts to listen for query and retrieve requests.

Throws:
IOException

stop

public void stop()
          throws IOException
Stops answering to query and retrieve requests. Unbinds the TCP server if there are no more SCP listening.

Throws:
IOException
